Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Judge', 3: "The camera cuts back to the main screen. You've reached the final round of this year's Block-Pulling Championship.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Judge', 3: "On the red team, we have Team Block Master! And on the blue team, representing Babylonia, it's 【kuroname】 and Karenina—Team Karenina Invincible!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The judge's loud voice hypes up the crowd. Despite the fancy name, the competition area is really just a small, simple tent."}
{3: 'You and a mechanoid sit across from each other at a square table in the middle. The tower of blocks between you is already starting to wobble. A few more moves, and this match will be over.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Judge', 3: "All right, what's the next move going to be?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '【kuroname】, you better not mess up now!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't you do it then?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I would've if I could! But they were too scared to go up against me, so they made you play instead!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: 'Are you two done talking? Hurry up and pull a block!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Yeah, yeah. 【kuroname】, go for that blue one. Once you pull it out, the gold one underneath will be exposed.', 4: '1'}
{3: "If you do what Karenina says, the whole tower will be dangerously unstable, and there'll only be a few safe blocks left."}
{2: '(Pull out the block)', 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Judge', 3: 'Wow, as expected of the famous Construct from the Engineering Force. That was a perfect move. Looks like Team Block Master is in trouble now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: 'Trouble? You two brats from Babylonia are the ones who should be worried.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: "I've been watching every move and glance. That Construct, Karenina, told you to go for the blue block, but her eyes were locked on a different one the whole time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '...So you noticed.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: "I'd bet anything that, under your little setup, the only block left that can actually be pulled is the one she kept staring at—that green one, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: "It's my turn now. I'm pulling it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After finishing its analysis, the Block Master mechanoid pulls out a block with such precision that the tower doesn't even tremble."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: 'I win!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then the tower crashes down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: "What? That should've been safe... Karenina, you tricked me!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Just because I looked at it doesn't mean I wanted to pull it. And for the record, I don't need tricks. We could play this game a hundred times and you still wouldn't beat me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You forget where I'm from. I could win a match like this with my eyes closed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Block Master Mechanoid', 3: "Hey! That's prejudiced...! Against machines! I'm gonna scrap you for that!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Bring it on!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Judge', 3: "Someone get over here! They're about to start a street fight!", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '——Obtained "Legendary Gold-Inlaid Block"——', 3: '50', 5: '0'}
{3: '——Obtained "Legendary Gold-Inlaid Block"——'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory912.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory912.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Heh. One more prize in the bag. By the way, 【kuroname】, didn't you promise WGAA you'd bring back some souvenirs?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kind of.', 3: '67', 4: 'How do you even know that?', 5: '68'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I helped you, didn't I?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Doesn't matter. The point is, I helped you, didn't I?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'At that, Karenina, who has been walking ahead, turns to face you with a smug grin.'}
{2: 'Yes, yes, my friend.', 3: '72', 4: 'Yeah, thank you.', 5: '74'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't push it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What's with the serious thank-you out of nowhere...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Whatever. Let's grab more souvenirs. Food's no good. Maybe some locally made weapons?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why are you going out of your way to help me?', 3: '78'}
{3: 'After hearing the question, Karenina freezes in place, then clenches her fist and takes a deep breath.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I knew you'd ask that. Fine. I'll just say it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '【kuroname】, I want you to spend today with me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'May I ask why?', 3: '89', 4: 'Is this a confession?', 5: '87'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "No! It's not! Don't get weird about it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The Engineering Force started messing around before the festival. They voted on who would be the loneliest on Double Seventh.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tch. I just didn't want anyone looking down on me. And you just happened to be nearby when I got here. Simple as that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So I was just someone you grabbed at random?', 3: '95'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "No... This is Double Seventh. You think I'd just grab a random person?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her voice rises, but she lowers her head. Her bangs fall over her face, hiding her expression.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If I hadn't grabbed you at the entrance, someone else might've...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You stay quiet for the next ten minutes or so. Neither of you is quite sure where to start or what to say.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...A little more to the left.', 4: '1'}
{3: "After gently patting Karenina's head, you both stand in silence for the next ten minutes or so, listening to the sounds of the crowd around you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph. You're such an idiot, 【kuroname】. What's with that serious look? I was just quoting a line from a drama I saw the other day!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Anyway, you're all mine today. I'm going to grab you as many souvenirs as I can, and you're not allowed to say no, understood?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina lifts her head, her proud, commanding air instantly returning.'}
{2: 'Looks like all I can do is follow your lead.', 3: '114'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's better. Come on, 【kuroname】, the Double Seventh celebration is about to start!", 4: '1'}
